pages.text: 54|50|Arau amara adesa kerala eta katha, cakura palakara darae.
54|51|Arau ami tomalokara darae bahutake dhbansa karaicho; eteke upadesa grahanakarai konoba achene
54|52|arau sihamte yi karaiche, se'i sakalo ‘amalanamata’ (lipibad'dha) ache
54|53|arau sakalo sarau-bara katha likhita ache.
54|54|Niscaya muttakbisakala thakiba baga-bagica arau nijaraasamuhara majata
54|55|yathayogya asanata, sarbasaktimana maha adhipati (allaha)ra sannidhyata.
55|1|Ara-raahamana, (dayamaya allaha)
55|2|teraemi siksa diche kora'ana
55|3|teraemi srsti karaiche manuha
55|4|teraemi taka bhasa sika'iche
55|5|Surya arau candra nirdharaita hicapa anuyayi arartana karae
55|6|arau trnalata arau brksadiye chajada karae
55|7|arau teraemi akasakhanaka samunnata karaiche arau sthapana karaiche tulacani
55|8|yate tomaloke jokha-makhata simalanghana nakaraa.
55|9|Arau tomaloke n'yayasangatabharae ojana pratistha karaa arau ojanakrta bastu kama nidiba.
55|10|Arau prthiraikhanaka te'om srsti jirara babe sthapana karaiche
55|11|ya’ta ache phala-mula arau khejura gacha, yara phala araranamukta
55|12|arau ache bakaliyukta dana arau sugandhiyukta phula.
55|13|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|14|teraemi manuhaka srsti karaiche pani misraita sukana matira paraa yito poraa matira darae
55|15|arau teraemi jinaka srsti karaiche dhomraabihina agnisikhara paraa.
55|16|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
